title: I cannot see any friends online but they actually are.
body: I cannot see any friends online but they actually are.

replies.body:
**Mindstar **has posted an announcement here in case your issue is still ongoing:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/B41QTqBZ-1542016-friends-list-chat-issues

> **_UPDATE 22:30_
> We've made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue. Let us know if it is fixed!**
> 
> Original Post
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of some issues with the chat system which are causing player's friends lists to not display correctly or at all.
> 
> We're working on it now so stay tuned for updates.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar
run a repair on your client
the point is I changed to my other acc, it works perfectly.
